website_summaries.verdict: Small personal speaker that contains a clip so you can easily carry it anywhere you're going.
pros: Only weighs 6.5 ounces, so it's comfortable to carry with you, clipped to your clothing
Easily makes a Bluetooth connection with your device
Offered in multiple color options so you can find your favorite
Includes a microphone, so you can use it to take voice calls from your smartphone
cons: Only 8 hours of battery life, after taking 2.5 hours to charge

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound per Pound! Great for hiking, backpacking, and camping.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound and value! I've contemplated Bluetooth speakers such as Bose, but this fits my on-the-go needs better with its easy carabiner attachment for clipping to packs while backpacking, camping, and boating - hence the waterproof feature is essential although I haven't really tested its H20 limits. Beyond the convenient Bluetooth connectivity, it also has an (out) aux sound chord for plugging into other none-Bluetooth capable devices such as older iPods. I use mine for connecting to my iPhone or older iPod for on-the-go movie time while camping. There is a reason I see this device sold everywhere - it's got more sound per pound. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Braislin

customer_reviews.title: Surprised dropped from 87 feet
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker. I was working inside glass Tower at 87 feet high and accidentally dropped it down and for my surprise it was still working and I didn't loose Bluetooth connection to speaker. So I had it playing music from there till the end of my shift. When I went down to pick it up it only had minor ding on the side and front screen felt off. I'm still using it thanks JBL for good quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Out 60 bucks
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a little over a month and it won't charge. Very disappointed. Out 60 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After a month, my speaker is not working. ...
customer_reviews.text: After a month, my speaker is not working. After I left it charging, the battery light is changing from red light to blue light, it is not turning on and I also can not connect the bluetooth !! What can you do for me?
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker for work and wet conditions
customer_reviews.text: The JBL clip 2 is a small speaker with big sound! I carry this speaker often on my belt loop at the docks while working and driving boats. The main features i was looking for in a speaker, before i bought the clip, was small, lightweight, Bluetooth (so i wouldnt have to deal with cords), and the ability to atleast resist water. This speaker has displayed all of the mentioned features without fail, and has even been soaked with me in the pouring rain and continues to play my favorite music as well as ever. Well worth the price, and you cant go wrong with JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Nice battery, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Had it a few days. I own a few Bluetooth speakers of all shapes and sizes. This however is the smallest. But the sound is impeccable. Didn't know something this small could have that much bass. I ride bicycles a lot, different kinds for different applications. On the beach cruiser clipped to the hip it is perfect. Big enough sound to ride with traffic or just the waves. Only downfall is battery. So far it lasted about 9-10 hrs on "on and off" play. The battery on the meter showed about 750mAh. I'll let you know more as it ages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works much better than the Clip+
customer_reviews.text: I love JBL products, but the first Clip+ was the worst product ever made. It kept cutting off, and the Bluetooth connectivity was terrible. Then I saw the Clip 2 on sale and took a gamble. JBL has redeemed themselves! The Clip 2 works flawlessly for the most part, and the battery lasts longer than the manufacturer claims. You don't get much range out the Bluetooth though...maybe 20 feet, and the buttons are difficult to find. Anytime I get a call, I'm always fumbling to find the answer button, or the off button, or the volume buttons.. A nice addition to future models would be a really small display to show callers name, battery level, Bluetooth range, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Zackry Cephas

customer_reviews.title: Small speaker packs a powerful punch!
customer_reviews.text: JBL does it again with a small, but powerful speaker! If you're looking for a small footprint with excellent sound, this is it. I also have a JBL Xtreme for backyard pool parties. This obviously can't compare, but for it's size, it is just wonderful. Clear sound and good bass. Battery lasts a long time between charges. Easily paired with two smartphones. Contrary to other reviews, I like the on and off sounds JBL uses on their speakers - they let you know you've turned the device on or off. I would definitely recommend. You can't beat it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers. I started buying these small JBL speakers about 7 years ago. I have dropped and broken a few but this newer design is great. Very durable, long battery life/charge and good quality sound. The clip is handy and I can go quite a distance from my iPad or phone and still maintain a solid Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Chesbay

customer_reviews.title: Loud but not great
customer_reviews.text: Loud, but sound quality is not that good. Sounds muffled, almost like there was a towel covering it. I purchased this bluetooth speaker after reading all the glowing reviews of how fantastic it was. I'm guessing either 98% of reviewers here have no clue what good sound quality is, or I was sent yet another made in China garbage that seems to be in abundance lately on Amazon. Seriously considering not renewing Prime and paying more at local stores if I keep getting sent poorly made, low quality items. If you are looking for a decent, potrable bluetooth speaker, keep looking. This one sounds as bad as you would expect from a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: MickeyFanTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Tough speaker, quality sound
customer_reviews.text: I have used this little JBL Clip2 speaker for years now. Just bought a second bc I want to link them. We have hung this in the shower with a command hook for months with no issues, taken it to the lake and on several family trips. This speaker plays clearly and is surprisingly loud for its' size. Love the little clip on top for hanging on backpacks and hooks outside while entertaining. I wish I could give it 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BH Prime

customer_reviews.title: The blue tooth connectivity isn't the best. It will lose signal sometimes and the music ...
customer_reviews.text: The blue tooth connectivity isn't the best. It will lose signal sometimes and the music cuts out if I have it clipped to my belt loop and my phone in my pocket on the opposite side of my body. Seems my body is enough to block the Bluetooth signal, I can replicate making it cut out every time if I position it properly. Other than that, for the size and price, it sounds really good and the volume is loud. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: viral

customer_reviews.title: Perfect "pocket" speaker
customer_reviews.text: I decided on this older version for the price, given the difference between this and the clip 3 didn't seem substantially different. I really enjoy it.. Good range, battery life, and sound. I take it everywhere. Deducting a star because its kinda flat, and at higher volume theres some distortion. Sounds great for something so small though.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Can take abuse and has amazing build quality
customer_reviews.text: I put this poor thing through hell. I work in a loud warehouse and unfortunately has been dropped multiple times and the speaker cover has been exposed now for a few months. But the build quality is 100% top notch sounds pretty decent. I use this thing at max volume all the time for hours a day because it’s real loud where I work and the speakers haven’t blown yet and it’s been almost a year now. That being said the battery life for me is about an hour but I usually always have it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: cforkash112

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF!!!! NOT EVEN SPLASH PROOF
customer_reviews.text: Speaker works great but it is not waterproof. First, let me see that i never let my speaker become submerged in water. I had it next to the pool one day and someone decided to do a cannonball and water slashed on it. 5 minutes later the music just stops and the speaker began cracking and making noises like it was possessed. They advertise this speaker around pools and even underwater. Just don't get it wet!
customer_reviews.author: Everett V Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the calling capabilities as of yet, but the sound quality for music and videos is fantastic. I used to just use the loudest setting on my phone, but this sounds much better and is easy to clip on just about anything small enough to fit in the hook. I'll use it to listen to music in the shower and the steam and water don't seem to affect it at all. Overall, I suggest this product if you're looking for something portable to play audio.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am so so sad and very disappointed to be posting this. I absolutely love this brand and had the older version of this speaker until it fell into the ocean last week and I lost it. I reordered this one and have only had problems with it since. It won’t charge, won’t turn on without being plugged in and doesn’t easy connect to Bluetooth. It keeps flashing blue and red lights and it’s frustrating mostly that it doesn’t just turn on because the whole point of this speaker is to bring it places and I can’t do that without an outlet. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Ruther

customer_reviews.title: Very portable, good sound, easy to connect
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great. It is super portable, it turns on super quickly and connects quickly as well. The audio quality sounds great to me and the volume is good (but won't knock your socks off). This was a great purchase for a last minute vacation pack. I am very pleased with it and have been using it as a shower speaker with great success. It is very portable and light.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Grattoni

customer_reviews.title: So impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my speaker in the mail. I opened it up and and was able to connect to Bluetooth very easily! (I always have a hard time connecting other devices). The sound quality is much more than I expected from a speaker that size. I’m excited to put this baby to use while.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite speakers
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of speakers and this one is one of my favorites. With it having a clip I can always hook it to my shorts and be able to be hands free and listen to music anytime. Since it is waterproof I don't have to worry about it being outside. It is very loud and clear for its size as well. The bluetooth sometimes fades in and out even when my phone is right next to it, but it works pretty much perfectly other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: ... is just a step above my phones sound- not good.
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is just a step above my phones sound- not good.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: It was great — for a while
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker in May 2018, and it worked great. I was very happy with it. But then in August 2019 it stopped working correctly. You couldn’t turn it off! You could turn off the source of the music, of course, but even then, the speaker would stay on no matter what. I just had to leave it on... which meant every time my cellphone rang, it would broadcast through the speaker. So I had to stop using it. (Three months out of its 1- year warranty. )
customer_reviews.author: Music Addict

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little speaker. I've taking this thing everywhere I go now. Walking, hiking, biking, kayaking, snowboarding I mean everywhere. The battery life is great and the overall durability. The only down fall you cant skip tracks from the speaker itself.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little speaker with great sound!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this little speaker! I can carry it around the house, use it to work out, clean etc and it amps up the sound quality of my phone just enough for ultimate satisfaction. And it can be synced to two devices at one time! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Price and size make this speaker a win-win in my book.
customer_reviews.text: For the size and the price I really like this speaker. I use it mostly attached to my disc golf bag, but have also used it for going on walks with my family. I will agree with those who posted that the bass is not deep, but you wont find that on virtually any speaker this small in size. I like that when connected via bluetooth the speaker can be used without taking your phone out. Volume is decent and so far I have not had an instant time the battery has given out even though i do not charge it every time we use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jamin J. Anliker

customer_reviews.title: Sound is low
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clip to my Motorcycle while riding. This is a great product, however is smaller than expected, is not load enough even when it’s not clipped to my load motorcycle. The battery life is ok, lasts about 2 hours of consistent play.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole A Haskett

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is great for such a small speaker. I bought 2, one for myself and one for my husband. My husband uses his all the time, and if his battery runs down, he just simply grabs a hold of mine! He uses it with his computer to make presentations, to show a movie or just to play music. It's quite versatile. HE had insisted that he wanted an echo dot, but when he got a hold of this versatile gadget, all other speakers were "laid to rest!"
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have had one of these speakers for two years. It still works great but, its gotten hard to get it to charge. The battery still runs for ten hours (at a low volume). Four to five at max volume. I use it everyday. Clips to my safety vest or anything else near me. So nice to not be hooked to wires. Great sound. Lightweight. I work in construction and it takes a beating. I got my new one from amazon. (Deal Stop). It arrived before expected, and is excactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: JBL rocks!
customer_reviews.text: JBL has been around for many decades and make an excellent quality product. I actually have three of these little speakers. One I keep at work, one I keep up my toolshed and one I keep on the glove box of the car for when I go camping and hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Zabby

customer_reviews.title: My daughter took it around the world!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVED this speaker. She took with her to India, Nicaragua, and Israel. That is in addition to many bikerides and camping trips throughout the States. She ended up giving it to a friend in Israel, and bought a replacement immediately.
customer_reviews.author: SE Teachers Rock!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the speaker and should have bought two at the time, but I'm going to purchase another one soon! Good sound! Good battery life! It makes listening to music on my phone a good listen! Also, it's easy to carry and quite cute, too. I chose the orange-colored speaker. Buy it and enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Treewizdom

customer_reviews.title: Now it buzzes in a bad, bad way.
customer_reviews.text: Update: now when it turns on there will be 2 buzzing sounds like it is under some kinda interference. All sounds that come out thereafter are somewhat distorted. So disappointing. Hook can be designed to open up easier. No lower back feet to straighten it when being hung and rested against a surface. No USB-C in 2018? Very water-proof. Decent battery usage but slow-charging.
customer_reviews.author: The Original Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: A Real Beach Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered a new one and what I got could NOT have been new. The packaging was loose and crinkly on the inside, the cord was not tightly "factory" wrapped and there is a scuff on it. I turned it on after charging and it just went off after a couple of hours and was still on the charger! Bought it for use for a day at the beach this week and not time for all the hassle of return. New, it's probably a good product. This used one that I thought was new? Not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Carla L. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, I have I pretty loud for two days at a time before I recharge it. I’m not very nice to it and it keeps on kickin. The fun part is you can link these speakers together
customer_reviews.author: Hale

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic/UPDATE TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this great sound and waterproof live it. Wish I had ordered sooner UPDATE. Terrible less than a year later and it will not hold charge Had 60% charge yesterday and it lasted only 1 1/2 hours. Unreal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this used. Tried to connect and it wouldn’t. Put it back in the box to return and it connected. Haven’t had any problems with that again. Battery only lasts for about 2 hours. Overall what I payed for it, wasn’t a bad deal but probably won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KJK1971

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. He asked me to get it for him so he could listen to Pandora via his iPhone while he worked outside building our new enclosed screened porch. I bought it because it was waterproof-I just knew he was going to forget and leave it outside-which actually has not happened! Definitely would recommend, we use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Monica B.

customer_reviews.title: Charge it and clip it
customer_reviews.text: Works really well for hikes, long walks or bike rides, which was the intended purchase. It’s durable, easy to use and keep clean. Really happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: chiquitanerd

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I've had intermittent problems connecting via Bluetooth. The sound quality and volume is better than I expected. Battery life as with any rechargeable product it depends on volume level but overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Two years, still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Feb '17, reviewed Dec '18, after nearly two years the battery is still fine, BT reception fine, sound fine, appearance fine, no problems. Much better and loner lasting than the cheaper "soundbot" knock offs I tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: nanogiga

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker until the charger breaks
customer_reviews.text: Was a great speaker for the price. Long battery life, good Bluetooth range and impressive sound for the size. Would have rated 5 star but after a couple months a piece of the charging port broke off in the cable it came with and it will no longer charge. Quite a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sean T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this purchase. Sound quality is really good much better than other brands I've tried. And battery life is wonderful. The only real complaint I have is the volume control. When you turn it down a notch from full blast it's a lot quieter.
customer_reviews.author: SimKue

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: box was a little beat up but the JBL Clip 2 is intact. Great quality sound for how small it is. I love the clip how its redesigned to be a carabiniere. I had the first generation and the clip was too small. This one is much better and more versatile. This speaker gets pretty loud too. I bring it to work and it fills a standard room with sound.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah McKool

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is a great value--the sound quality is great, it's super lightweight and portable, charges quickly, and has multiple uses. We use it at home, on our baby stroller when we're out on walks, my husband takes it to play golf, and we've taken it kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Cutle little speaker--convienient
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker for my 11 year old to take on his bike. But the sound quality isn't the best. It's not a super expensive product, so I'm happy, he's happy. I am not sure a teen would be happy with the sound quality. Also the battery life seems to be a bit short.
customer_reviews.author: MemRead

customer_reviews.title: The volume is nice and loud and the built in aux cable is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this speaker for a long time now. I work outside in an auto shop in the Texas heat and humidity and I've never had an issue. The volume is nice and loud and the built in aux cable is a god send. The Bluetooth connection is good for up to about 50 feet but the draw back is using the Bluetooth will drain your battery faster. It's about 4-5 hours on Bluetooth but 8-9 when using the aux cable. Overall this speaker is a workhorse and a quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: HE LOVED IT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend for when he's on the road in hotel room after hotel room ! He LOVES it. it syncs easily with his phone and his iPad- for sports, music and videos. I have the original one and he always liked using it when I visited him on the road-now he has his own!!
customer_reviews.author: Joyful One

customer_reviews.title: It's great..
customer_reviews.text: It's great ...!could be just a little louder but it still bumps! Dropped in water on rafting trip snatched it out with THE quickness! Left it in Sun for 2 hours n kept playing like nothing happened Id say accident proof! Not made for diving with lol SERIOUSLY THOUGH IT HAS QUALITY ACOUSTICS FOR THE SIZE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kdog Lambro

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take kayak fishing. Its louder than needed, sound is great, used about 6 hours and battery is still going. Definitely a great purchase. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought to use when biking and camping. Thought it would be good to have a small waterproof bluetooth speaker. I use it daily now though, in the kitchen, while showering, etc. Great sound quality. The one feature i wasn't expecting, but now use frequently, is it's speakerphone functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Burnas

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my kayak and while fishing and camping. The sound quality is great, the battery lasts a long time and it gets great volume for a little speaker. I've had about 8 friends sitting around a fire and this speaker effectively played the music so we could all hear it. I'm a big fan.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working - Battery Charge Issues
customer_reviews.text: After 40 days it stopped being able to charge. And the 1 year warranty with JBL is total crap, their warranty forms on their website is disabled and it’s impossible to speak to a customer service rep. Its best to seek out options with aleast a 90 day return policy to make sure your device isnt a dud.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Meh!
customer_reviews.text: All I'm sayin' is the Sony kicks JBL's ass all over the bluetooth village. If it were touted as great for vocal reproduction alone if he cool with it. This thing blows for stereo reproduction due to it's missing certain frequencies most humans like to hear. I used to like JBL. Now they're garbage and I'm old.
customer_reviews.author: Darren Jay Blagden

customer_reviews.title: A+ product
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend put one full charge on it then used it. It lasted about 9 hours of constant Pandora playing when we took it on the snowboarding trip. She uses it in the shower and hangs it on a hook so it has been wet and still does fine. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from a little speaker! Love it! I have one and bought this one for my husband. He spends time in an off grid cabin so he can use it to pair with his phone and play music. I love to clip it on my belt loop while I work and can have my phone on the charger. It has pretty good range....I can go from room to room without loosing bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great mobile speaker
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephews hs graduation as he headed off to college. He is quite pleased with the speaker and takes it with home everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: She says it works great very loud and clear what a bonus waterproof don't ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter for a birthday present. She says it works great very loud and clear what a bonus waterproof don't have to worry about replacing it when she falls into the Swimming pool. I'm glad I did the research first this seemed like the best one for the price and they were right.
customer_reviews.author: Allen B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Used a friends & bought my own cause I loved it so much!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had used this speaker borrowed from a friend and then I bought my own cause I loved it so much! It’s portable but powerful AND waterproof!!! Sound quality is good for me but can’t say much about battery life cause I don’t use it for hours on end. Sometimes a little complicated to connect via Bluetooth but not impossible!
customer_reviews.author: Y M

customer_reviews.title: Great for birding
customer_reviews.text: I need a portable, loud speaker for playing bird calls when birding. This seems to do the trick quite well. My previous speaker would have trouble connecting to my phone but this connects instantly when powered on. Overall much more reliable than the cheaper brands. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Got this for both of my nieces to take with them to softball/lacrosse practice so they can listen to music. They love it because it sounds great, is durable and easy to attach to different surfaces! My only complaint is to make sure I'm out of ear shot from their terrible taste in music!
customer_reviews.author: Fore Caddy Golf

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound and portable too!
customer_reviews.text: We use this for music in the car primarily. We can move it from car to car if we choose but we mostly leave it in one car bc we got another for the other car.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Mackenzie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Super awsome
customer_reviews.text: This is above and beyond what I was expecting. I love it, love the sleek and functional design. It looks and feels really expensive. Plus the sound quality is just perfect and the clip is going to come in so handy and convient. I haven't gotten it wet or sandy yet so can't speak to that. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Everything is good except volume control
customer_reviews.text: Bought the speaker for a friend. The feedback I received from my friend is that it's quite portable, sturdy. Sound quality is good for a portable speaker. The only flaw is the volume control. Hard to tune to the volume that he wants.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Phenomenal Sound Experience
customer_reviews.text: I love this device. I have phenomenal sound quality, making my journey to work enjoyable. I listen to my Audible books and I never have to wonder if I missed something.
customer_reviews.author: Basia

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed by this little guy. Quality is good for the size, and the battery lasts forever. Recharge was pretty quick using a portable power source. Feels very well made. Would be five stars, but the cover for the charging port doesn't close very well, due to the fit for the water proofing. All in all, it's a very well made speaker with some really good features for back country use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On the go speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom for work and it worked okay, but I don’t know what happened to it because it doesn’t work as good as it once did but it lasted long enough to be considered a well used product
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Best little guy I've bought thus far.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best small waterproof bluetooth speakers I've ever owned, and I've owne probably 20 in the last 8 years or so. Easy on/off, great connectivity, sound is good, and it's durable.
customer_reviews.author: Seth P. Teel

customer_reviews.title: Much better than most speakers that size
customer_reviews.text: Sound is spectacular in this tiny speaker. Much better than most speakers that size. Battery also last forever. I love showering listening to tunes with it
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a gift and the package arrived damaged. This is still a great speaker with great sound quality but it looks bad when the packaging is severely damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kim McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is ok. After about 20 uses it won't charge above 60% and drops bluetooth connection at about 40% charge. The charge declines rapidly when it is turned off.
customer_reviews.author: Ol Ag 74

customer_reviews.title: Great, portable, and sleek speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, small, portable, and great sound quality. Pairs with my phone(iPhone 7) very fast and have yet to have an issue. Love how the aux cord is already on the device, and neatly hidden. The buttons are nice and tictile. Was looking at getting a cheaper speaker, but just spend the extra money and you surely won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The next gen is better
customer_reviews.text: It started out pretty good and I was impressed. The battery only lasted about 2 hours on full volume and after only about 6 months the speaker started to rattle and finally blew out in less then a year of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Duquette

customer_reviews.title: Love this little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little speaker. For this price point it sounds amazing, it’s also durable and the batter lasts for a long time. I’ve had one on my office desk for 8 months and charged it once. I just bought a second for the beach. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Saz

customer_reviews.title: Almost satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could be better. I think this speaker commits suicide because of the music I play. Really wish this thing had a skip/replay button on the speaker. Bluetooth range is like 10-15 feet and it hates closed doors. Great sound though
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound & Convenient To Use
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good and has a great sound volume that is easy to adjust. Good battery life and connects easily via Blue Tooth.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Luedtke

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: For a speaker the size of the palm of your hand it is impressive. Bass is lacking, but the sound is crisp and loud enough to fill a large room. Love how compact it is, and it seems very durable. I have not tested the “waterproof-ness” of it, but it looks pretty well sealed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. Pros: Excellent sound given its size. Crisp highs and impressive bass. I like that you can prop it up with the caribiner clip if there's nowhere to attach it. A great deal for the price. Highly recommended. Cons: None. Buy one.
customer_reviews.author: pw808

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this and uses it with her Eno Nest Hammock in the woods, while skiing (hanging it off of her jacket and ski pants), and lots of other great places! We love this!!! What a great idea to add a hook!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Mom who adores her family :-)

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, decent bass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent accessory speaker with good sound for its size. It will replace my home made "boom" box for most occasions. I have not used Bluetooth yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Wittenborn

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and is still working haven't had no complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: midnight06

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing about this product that I don’t like. It has met or exceeded every expectation. It is easy to use and the sounds quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the sound for such a small speaker, and enjoy the clip feature. It appears to be well made and fairly rugged. It connected to my phone quickly with no issues. I can't rate the battery life as I haven't used it enough. Just for fun I left my phone on our front porch and was able to walk about 200 ft. away before the speaker lost contact.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sound for its size
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds the best out of all of the similar sized speakers (except Bose $$$). It is pretty loud and has excellent battery life. The Bluetooth doesn’t have the best range, but doesn’t drop while you are in range. The clip on it is handier than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: it sounds pretty good, however outside it's not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use while horseback riding. In the house, it sounds pretty good, however outside it's not very powerful. I would say better than average indoors, but not going to support anyone else riding with you. Will probably buy another for my husband's to use while we're out.
customer_reviews.author: ASIMERAL

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from this seller! Sells defective parts
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving it one star because I've had if for a day. And the charger that came with it (micro USB) didnt even work when it came out the box. Luckily I have a spare charger... Seems to work for now. But really how could u mail me a defective cord I haven't even used once!!! Not good for shadowing for the quality of this thing. Bad bad bad. As I'm checking the reviews there seems to be a lot of negatives.. even though it shows an average of over 4 stars....suspect...luckily I have no intentions of this thing lasting me more than 2 months
customer_reviews.author: michael s.

customer_reviews.title: MY EDC SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: I take this with me to work. The battery life is outstanding. Waterproof. Perfect for office music, business conference calls, or at home in the kitchen or bathroom showering. This should be your go to Bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Candid Man

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a small speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, great sound and value. I had a earlier model about three years old still works great now my wife has it. I trust JBL products and have a premium system in my car. Only had this for a month or so but I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mikcon

customer_reviews.title: mini boomer
customer_reviews.text: This speaker packs a punch especially if youre using for a small room or even in your car. Worth the price. Just becareful trying to charge it, it can be a tight fit and remove from base of charging plug dont want to ruin it but grabbing from the cord.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of these. My husband had a generic brand one and he borrowed mine and was super impressed. Bought this for husband and father and they both love them as much as I love be mine! Easy to link to phone and sound quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Soul Living

customer_reviews.title: Bad bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I've now had two of these and both have Bluetooth failures. They still work when connect via cord.
customer_reviews.author: Mike MacSkivvy

customer_reviews.title: Great personal speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I work outside and I like listening to the radio, podcasts, and just personal favorites. I attatch this to my belt loop and its blasting music all day! ITS SO LOUD!!! Its not that uneven sound where the bass overpowers everything else or theres not enought bass, no. This speaker was built very well! It actually looks a bit stylish too. I havent tested it in the rain or anything yet. I prettymuch baby it. When it rains I cover it with my rain gear lol I dont want to hurt it! But im sure itll work just as good. I have had jbl products in the past and they ALWAYS deliver
customer_reviews.author: J-Bonez091391

customer_reviews.title: Beach Sounds
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for the beach or cyclist or for someone who does not want headphones so that they can hear what else is around them. Has a clip so you don't lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R.

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my wireless devices
customer_reviews.text: Big sound from a small speaker. Well made. Battery life seems to be 3+ hours (I have not run it out yet). Recharge is very quick. Range is about 50'. Would recommend purchasing the matching carrying case for a tidy and secure carry.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Twist

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Love this speaker. Can't wait to get second so I can connect them together for more sound
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Rivera

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have this speaker clipped on to a bicycle it’s loud enough to hear the music clearly when I ride so it’s just what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: This works perfectly and projects great sound! We use it on our boat in ...
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly and projects great sound! We use it on our boat in the summer and outside when we are working in the yard. I haven't reviewed many products but this one deserves it. It's easy to use, easy to connect, and we haven't had a single problem out of it since I purchased it months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Hester P.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the money. Been using to listen to podcasts in the shower, so it is definitely waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: Starts to buzz and rattle in approx 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Good volume and sound. For about 2 months. And then it starts to buzz and rattle when you play at any volume louder than a hum. I wear it during my bike commute so it has to be pretty loud. 2 months is unacceptable to hear a buzz. I procrastinated returning it in time and now I regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No brainer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. Way better than what I expected. I use it for BBQing, road-trips, vacations. Its very solid, and connects easy to your device. I have had several people come up to me asking what it was and where they can find it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mike

customer_reviews.title: New Model Shorts out
customer_reviews.text: JBL Clip 2 shorts out after less than a month of ownership. The previous model of JBL Clip lasted for years, had great sound and battery life. I do not know if we got a lemon, defective item or is quality control has gone down hill? Very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane G.

product_meta.title: JBL Clip 2 Waterproof Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackClip-on convenience:
wireless Bluetooth streaming: wirelessly stream high-quality sound from your smartphone or tablet. Rechargeable battery: built-in rechargeable li-ion battery supports up to 8 hours of playtime. Speakerphone: take crystal clear calls from your speaker with a touch of a button - thanks to the noise and echo-free speakerphone. Built-in carabiner: hook the clip 2 onto anything you see fit and take it on all your adventures. IPX7 waterproof: No more worrying about rain or spills; you can even submerge the clip 2 in water. Wireless daisy chain: you can wirelessly connect two clip 2 speakers together to enjoy amplified sound. Integrated 3.5mm audio cable: if your music player does not have Bluetooth, plug the audio cable into it and enjoy your music all the same. Lifestyle materials: The durable fabric Material and rugged rubber housing allows your speaker to outlast all of your adventures.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars3,082 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
